alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Crawford and western Barton Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arcadia, or 13 miles north of Pittsburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Liberal, Mulberry, Mindenmines, Arcadia, Burgess, Croweburg, Iantha, Oskaloosa and Hannon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern and west central Missouri.
